scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Peter Taylor collection consists of a typed signed letter, March 16, 1982, from Robert Giroux, of Farrar, Straus & Giroux, Inc. Book Publishers, to Peter Taylor, Key West, Florida, asking him if he would like to read and supply a promotional blurb for an advance copy of Mary Lee Settle's novel, The Killing Ground,which will be published on June 14th.
